webjump_braspag_pagador.label: Braspag by Webjump
webjump_braspag_pagador.comment:
Pagador Braspag
Accept all the main payment method in an easy and safe manner.
Click here to configure

hint.hint:
Accept all the main payment method in an easy and safe manner.
Click here to know more.


Developed by Webjump. Oficial Magento Partner

status_update.label: Status Update
status_update.comment:
This feature automatically update order status when customer pay an Boleto or a payment with authentication on issuer.
To use this feature, you must ask for Braspag setup the update status post to url: "{{secure_url}}/braspag_pagador/status/update".
If you don't know which are your store secure_url, access System->Configuration->Web->Secure.

allowed_ips.label: Allowed IPs from Braspag
allowed_ips.comment:
The order status update for security reasons must only accept requests from Braspag IPs. For more details, consult the integration manual.
Type one IP address per line.

installments_interest_rate.label: Interest Rate
installments_interest_rate.comment: Interest rate defined by card issuer.

payment_button_label.label: Label for print button at checkout

autoredirect.label: Automatically redirect to bank page
autoredirect.comment: Leave empty to not redirect automatically or type the delayed time in seconds

payment_instructions.label: Payment instructions for customer at checkout

payment_button_label.label: Label for print button at checkout

boleto_expiration_date.label: Days for expiration
boleto_expiration_date.comment: If empty, we will use the days configured by affiliation.

boleto_instructions.label: Instructions to be printed on the Boleto
